summary.para: Provides properties, methods, and events that modify or retrieve information about how the CrystalReportViewer control appears and functions.
Closes a view tab in the CrystalReportViewer control.

param.name: viewURI
param.para: Indicates a string value that contains the name of the view tab.

summary.para: Drills down on a group.

param.name: groupInfo
param.para: A TotallerNodeID object that represents the group to drill down on.

summary.para: Exports the report displayed in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Gets the current page number of the report.

returns.para: Returns the page number that is currently displayed in the CrystalReportViewer.

summary.para: Prints the report displayed in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Refreshes the report displayed in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Searches the report for the given text.

param.name: text
param.para: Represents the string to search for.

returns.para: Returns true if the text was found, or false if the text was not found.

summary.para: Shows the first page of the report.
Shows the group tree in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Shows the last page of the report.
Shows the next page of the report.
Shows the specified page of the report.

param.name: PageNumber
param.para: Indicates the page number to show in the CrystalReportViewer control.

summary.para: Shows the previous page of the report.
Changes the magnification level of the CrystalReportViewer control.

param.name: ZoomLevel
param.para: Indicates the percentage at which to magnify the CrystalReportViewer.

summary.para: Gets or sets the index of the active view in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Gets or sets the background color for the control.
Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
Gets or sets the background image layout as defined in the System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout enumeration.
Determines whether the report is offset from the edge of its view window.
Gets or sets whether the tree view is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the status bar is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the toolbar is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the user can drill down into the report.
Gets or Sets whether tool tips are displayed in the report viewer.
Gets or sets the logon information for an enterprise report.
Gets or sets the TableLogOnInfos collection.
Gets or sets the parameter fields collection.
Sets the report to bind to the CrystalReportViewer control.
Gets or sets the information needed to create an internal ReportSource object.
Gets or sets whether the text appears from right to left, such as when using Hebrew or Arabic fonts.
Gets or sets the record selection formula of the report.
Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control's toolbar has the button for closing a report page.
Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control's toolbar has the button for exporting.
Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control's toolbar has the button for specifying a page number.
Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control's toolbar has the button for showing or hiding the group tree.
Gets or sets whether the CrystalReportViewer control's toolbar has the buttons for page navigation.
Gets or sets whether the print button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the refresh button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the search button on the toolbar is visible or hidden.
Gets or sets whether the zoom factor list on the toolbar is visible or hidden.
Gets the number of views in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Gets or sets the record selection formula to filter the data that are currently used in the report.
Event fires when a report is drilled down on.
Event fires when the user drills down on a subreport.
Event fires when an error occurs in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Event fires when an exception occurs in the CrystalReportViewer control.
Event fires when the user navigates through a report.
Event fires when the data in the report is refreshed.
Event fires when text is searched for in the report.
Event fires when zoom level of the CrystalReportViewer control changes.
Provides data for the Drill event.
Returns whether the event has actually moved into a deeper level.
Gets the group level that was drilled into.
Gets the group name that was drilled into.
Gets the group number and the current group level that was drilled into.
Gets the new group level that is being drilled into.
Gets the group number and group level that is being drilled into.
Represents the method that will handle the Drill event.
Provides Data for the DrillDownSubreport event.
Gets the subreport name that was drilled into.
Gets the page number that the subreport is on.
Gets the location in the CrystalReportViewer control where the subreport is.
Gets the subreport name that is being drilled into.
Gets the page number to drill into the subreport.
Gets the location in the CrystalReportViewer control to drill into the subreport is.
Represents the method that will handle the DrillSubreport event.
Provides Data for the HandleException event.
Gets exception data.
Gets or sets any type of data that can be used to override what is done when an exception is handled
Represents the method that will handle the Exception event.
Provides Data for the Navigate event.
Gets the current page number.
Get the page that is being navigated to.
Represents the method that will handle the Navigate event.
Represents the method that will handle the Refresh event.
Provides data for the Search event.
Represents the method that will handle the Search event.
Provides data for the CrystalReportViewer control events.
Gets or sets whether the event was handled.
Provides data for the ViewZoom event.
Gets the current magnification factor of the CrystalReportViewer control.
Gets the new magnification factor of the CrystalReportViewer control.
Represents the method that will handle the Zoom event.
